name: XWUI Style Switch Component
description: Style preset switch component that allows switching between system, preset, and custom themes. Dynamically loads available presets and provides a multi-state switch interface for theme selection.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

styleInstance.description: Optional: provide existing XWUIStyle instance to use. If not provided, a new instance will be created.

styleConfig.description: Optional: configuration for creating XWUIStyle instance if styleInstance is not provided.

iconSize.description: Size of icons in the switch

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the switch container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
